member.name: M:Bridge.Car.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an object of class Car, with LicensePlate, Date and Brobizz as properties

member.name: M:Bridge.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of vehicle as type "Car".

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an object of class MC, with LicensePlate, Date and Brobizz as properties.

member.name: M:Bridge.MC.VehicleType
member.summary: Returns the type of vehicle as type "Motorcycle", shortened as "MC".

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an object of class Vehicle, with LicensePlate, Date and Brobizz as properties.

member.name: M:Bridge.Vehicle.Price
member.summary: Returns the price of the ticket. The function will also check if the vehicle has Brobizz, and return the discount price if true.
